ai-anya-e0605n21:2_0: who has shut out bad qualities,
ai-anya-e0605n21:5_0: From the mountain he went to the stream,
ai-anya-e0605n21:8_0: in the forest full of Ambaṭṭha.
ai-anya-e0605n21:13_0: May they lose their absorptions be happy!
ai-anya-e0605n21:15_0: to the masters of a single one, a hard worker,
ai-anya-e0605n21:17_0: neither strive nor get rid of desire.
